The Administrator and benevolent dictator of mastodon.se.

I post and boost mostly technology and federation related things. Sometimes cute pictures, jokes and introductions from interesting people. Swedish is the dominant language.

Free speech and expression are important but I have zero tolerance for any form of xenophobia. Never forget that we are human and we are all doing our best to live the human experience.

rules.text: Must follow Code of Conduct, and you must be able to read the CoC which is found in Swedish down below.
Content must adhere to Swedish or European laws.

Anything remotely NSFW should be labeled as such and hidden. Like blood, gore, violence, sexual images and videos.
No annoying advertising. You may advertise your own work to a reasonable extent, reports from users and moderators discretion decide what is reasonable.
Any proven robot found following multiple accounts not owned by the robot creator will lead to banning of that robot, or the instance hosting it.

rules.text: Be respectful of one another
If someone asks you to stop, STOP. Ignoring such a request, especially from a mod, will result at minimum in a timeout.
If there is an issue, use the reporting tools so moderators and admins can handle it.

No bigotry or harassment. grandma.space has a ZERO TOLERANCE policy for the instigation or perpetuation of hateful speech and ideology, disrespect of its members or staff, incendiary behavior, or other such inappropriate conduct.
Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts and use nsfw tags liberally on adult images, spoilers, and other content that not everyone may want to see.
Current event discussion is permitted but you are highly encouraged to use a current event or politics content-warning.

contactAccount.note:
I am a father of three, living in Australia, Wiradjuri country.

I am Regional CTO for Palo IT. I'm interested in DevSecOps, security, compliance, psychology, philosophy, IoT, sustainability, and a gazillion other stuff.

I am admin for techforgood.social, and video.techforgood.social.

I post about many things, some jokes and m√™mes, some tech, some questions... A bit of everything.

No content illegal in Australia, Europe, USA, Singapore, Thailand or your country of residence.

The goal of this community is to bring tech for good, like-minded people together. It's funded by an individual and will be scraped if it does not meet its goal.

instance.title: Rusted Neuron ‚Äì an Intentional Community
instance.shortDescription: Rusted Neuron is a Mastodon Instance operated by Jack William Bell
instance.description: Rusted Neuron is an invitation-only 'Intentional Community'. It is not intended to represent a specific focus, although the people you find here are generally intelligent, creative, and witty. Content and conduct rules are set by the community, not by fiat. The one thing we will not tolerate here is intolerance; you can agree to disagree, but you must treat others with respect. Currently the membership limit is 100 people and there are plenty of slots available. The goal is to try to replicate real-world community interaction and norms enforcement online. Keeping it small is intended to create a village atmosphere by staying well under Dunbar's Number.
instance.email: admin [at sign here] rustedneuron [dot here] com

Endeavour to be the best version of yourself

instance.title: Raverdon
instance.shortDescription:
This is for our friends. My time and space is limited.

Currently no external email is working to confirm accounts. So don't sign up with an email address other than your ravergram.club account.
instance.description: This is currently a micro community of friends and family without any good label to describe it.

contactAccount.note:
I am from Arizona and lived many places before ending up here north of San Francisco.

I currently work at a company providing social media for robots. Unlike us cyborgs, they have no rights.

I like growing my own food and my own internet services to share with family and friends. I build mental and physical strength by lowering my intake of corporate food and media.

You can follow me via RSS: https://friends.ravergram.club/@karl.rss but I post mostly to followers only.
#fedi22

rules.text: Disinformation and misinformation is welcome. The DGB (Disinformation Governing Board) is not here. Just be prepared to argue and have fun.
Build understanding. Don't sow division. This is tricky at times, but we don't want this place to be the toxic fighting ground that corporate platforms are designed to create.
No racism, bigotry or other kinds of punching down.
Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting.
No spam or advertising.
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
No illegal content.

instance.title: Cisti
instance.description:
Chi siamo

Questa istanza √® gestita allegramente dall'hacklab underscore e fa parte del server autogestito cisti.org.

Cos'√® Mastodon

Differentemente da altre piattaforme √® decentralizzato, il che significa che non c'√® un singolo server, azienda o persona che lo gestisce. Quando qualcuno crea la propria versione di Mastodon, questa √® chiamata una "istanza". Poich√© Mastodon √® open source, chiunque pu√≤ creare la propria istanza di Mastodon con le sue regole. Grazie a questo, tutte le istanze sono possedute, operate e moderate dalla comunit√† che le crea. Mentre le persone all'interno di una istanza possono seguirsi l'una l'altra, possono anche decidere di seguirsi all'interno di altre istanze e comunicare con membri di altri server in modo trasparente. Mastodon √® un social network libero che vuole mantenere le interazioni con le persone al primo posto. Mastodon non pu√≤ essere venduto e non pu√≤ essere comprato e non puo' essere bloccato dai governi. Ogni persona su mastodon e' libera di unirsi a qualsiasi comunit√† voglia, e comunicare con chiunque voglia.

Perch√© siamo speciali

  • siamo torinesi
  • ci teniamo alla privacy e rispettiamo l'anonimato

Policy

Qua puoi trovare le policy di mastodon cisti.

Scopri di pi√π

Qua una descrizione approfondita del progetto mastodon cisti. E qua un video di spiegazione di mastodon!

Privacy

E' molto semplice: facciamo di tutto per non avere log o informazioni personali da nessuna parte. Quindi se ci chiedono info personali la risposta e' immediata: "Non possiamo darti nessun dato personale perche' non lo abbiamo".

instance.title: Saturation
instance.shortDescription: A small group of people who remember when social media was more social, and less media.
instance.description:
At the moment, we are inviting through limited channels, to build a community of people we trust and who can trust one another. 

We will put together a code of conduct at some point but it‚Äôs also true that the early users have that code internalized already. 

Not sure what it will become but can say for sure what it won‚Äôt become, which is anything with money or power as a premise. We remember the magic of the internet, maintain a belief in it, and want Saturation to be a place where it can grow.

instance.title: Tweet Rex
instance.shortDescription: Great to meet new people, toot, and have some fun.
instance.description: Tweet Rex is a free and open social networking tool. Our only purpose if for people to communicate freely and have some fun. Common Sense Rules The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of tweettex.xo.uk; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies: The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline: - Excessive advertising - Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources - Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions - Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service: - Racism or advocation of racism - Sexism or advocation of sexism - Casteism or advocation of casteism - Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof - Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service: - Sexual depictions of children Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors: - Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that hasspecifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. -Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. - Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law. Cross-posting "Cross-posting" is the automatic copying of posts from one platform to another. That definition does not include the simultaneous posting to multiple platforms from the same app, such as Twidere or PostyBirb. If you use those apps, we consider those posts original, and the following need not apply. Cross-posting from Mastodon to other platforms is fully permitted.Cross-posting into Mastodon from another platform is permitted under the following terms: - The posts do not include platform-specific references, e.g. talking about "here" meaning Twitter, or including text from other non-Mastodon users verbatim (e.g. cross-posted quote tweets) - The account is at least semi-regularly monitored by the author, so that interactions from Mastodon users are not ignored - The account being cross-posted is owned by the same person. Third-party copying of content is not permitted

instance.title: OOUR
instance.shortDescription: OOUR (Osnovna Organizacija Udru≈æenog Rada / Basic Organization of Associated Labor) was, as the name suggest, was a legal concept from the early '70s that defined the smallest unit of economic endeavor in Socialist Federative Republic of Yugoslavia. Multiple OOURs would form associations that formed bigger companies, sometimes counting hundreds or even thousands of these "basic units" that represented different departments or other organizational points. All of it was truly publicly owned, but the workers comprising OOURs shared the profits and self-governed. This mandate required re-investing into the community, and in the end allowed for a real-world worker-controlled socialist utopia to materialize in Yugoslavia and usher an era of unprecedented prosperity--for a while, until the country's political collapse and war in the early '90s due to an onset of economic troubles that were exploited by jingoists. In any case: better futures are possible.

rules.text: Bigotry (racism, queerphobia, xenophobia, etc) will not be tolerated; this includes dogwhistles and known innuendos.
Do not advocate for right-wing, centrist, or neoliberal politics; this is a leftist instance.
If you make a mistake that hurts people, you must make a good-faith effort to apologize and actually acknowledge what you did; half-assed non-apologies or excuses will not suffice.

Try to settle interpersonal disputes yourself, but feel free to invoke me to ask for a block or defederation; if someone out there is flagrantly bigoted or otherwise dangerous, I want to know so I can protect myself and my users by defederating from them.
Seek to improve the world, not harm it. This is not the same as "be polite" - politeness has often been the enemy of true justice. It is okay to be mean or upset decorum.

This is by no means a complete list of server policy or things I will take action for; at the end of the day, this is still a personal instance for me and friends, and while I always try to act fairly and judicially when operating officially, I reserve the right to take action as I see fit.

rules.text: Deze server wordt gemodereerd volgens de Nederlandse en Europese regelgeving.
Discriminatie op basis van afkomst, huidskleur, geaardheid, overtuiging, etc. is niet toegestaan.
SPAM en andere vormen van ongewenste reclame zijn niet toegestaan. Promotie van eigen content is toegestaan mits het niet tegen de regels in gaat.

Content dat mogelijk ongeschikt is voor een groep gebruikers (bijv. op basis van leeftijd of overtuiging) moet zoveel als mogelijk, binnen de grenzen van redelijkheid, worden voorzien van een CW (Content Warning).
Content die schadelijk kan zijn voor de maatschappij, bijv. door het doen van opruiende uitspraken, is niet toegestaan.
Het beheer heeft de vrijheid om naar eigen inzicht te modereren en heeft het laatste woord bij eventuele disputen.

Vrijheids van meningsuiting wordt gerespecteerd, maar het brengen van ongefundeerde en niet onderbouwde feiten moet worden voorzien van een waarschuwing dat de gebrachte informatie 'onjuist kan zijn' en 'niet is voorzien van een redelijke onderbouwing'.
Vanwege beperkingen in moderatie is op deze server alleen het gebruik van een Europese taal toegestaan.

privacy?

Fancy joining?
Lets'run this instance democratically?
How?
for example:
Have an idea that might affect us all?
Lets' talk about it on a matrix channel and then, if needed, put it for a vote on something like https://www.loomio.org/


How many have joined?
There are a fair few people and much more seemingly bots on this instance.
(*117 users at the time of writing)
Only one person, a human presumably, is active - however, since the instance is open, the idea of doing it democratically and linked with FeDI seems appropriate.

Indeed, perhaps when considering democracy with bots on instances -
should they not get to be part of the process?

troet.crynet.one - cause capitalism makes you cry
Wenn Plattformen von Kapitalisten wie Zuckerberg, Must, etc. gesteuert werden endet das meistens nicht so wirklich gut. Deswegen ist das Fediverse eine gute alternative - viele Instanzen unterschiedlichster freiwilliger.
Und auch wir sind dabei und m√∂chten die Option bieten, teil des F√∂derierten Universums zu werden.
Normalerweise nur mit "Bewerbung", aber aufgrund der aktuellen Situation ganz offen.
Wenn ihr euch f√ºr Technik, Musik, Politik, Umwelt usw. interessiert seid ihr willkommen, andere Themen aber genauso!
Wichtig ist nur: #noAfD-Sympathisanten, Rassisten, Sexisten usw. werden hier nicht geduldet!

rules.text: Primary language is German, but other languages like English, etc. are allowed too
Use content warnings for sensitive and/or NSFW content, as well as topics, that could be triggering.
We have zero tolerance for racism, sexism, transphobia, antisemitism and similar. Showing such behavior will get you banned and in extreme cases reported to local authorities.
No doxxing or leaking of private information about users and/or non-users

Crossposts from Twitter to Mastodon are allowed. However the content isn't allowed to be spam. It's also not allowed to use phrases like "on here" when crossposting from Twitter to Mastodon and the account on Mastodon should also react to interactions by users in the fediverse.
Do not spam with your personal account and do not create bot accounts that post an insane amount of posts.

Please do not use this instance as your cloud storage for photos and videos. You can upload both and you can also focus your account on photography etc. However, please keep in mind that everything you post has to be stored somewhere, which costs us money.
You have to be at least 18 years old to register on this instance. If you're under 18 and we find out your account will get removed.

rules.text: Generally: Be excellent to each other!
We do not tolerate harrassment, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate racism, sexism, verbal abuse, discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or the advocation of any of these.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
Do not contact people who made clear they want no contact. This includes dogpiling/brigading.
Posts with sexual content or gore have to be tagged.
Advertisements have to be tagged, and must not be excessive or automated.

Automated posts should be unlisted to keep the local timeline of our instance a place of community dialogue and human interaction. This extends to bots, feed posters, Twitter "retweets" and Twitter crossposts with broken mentions.
Bots may only interact with a user when they're invited by that user to do so.
If you need to post with a high frequency, please set your posts to be unlisted to keep the local timeline readable.

In discussions, please remain civil, do not insult the people you're talking to, and try to avoid irony, sarcasm, or similar modes of language ‚Äì they typically don't translate well to written language and tend to escalate discussions or misunderstandings.
Cryptographic is harming the planet and the economy. Advertisement for cryptomining, in any form, will lead to a immediate suspension of the account.
Please report behaviour that bothers you. We will keep your report confidential.

Willkommen auf dem Mastodon-Server morsehaus!

morsehaus wurde einige Tage nach der Twitter-√úbernahme von Elon Musk gegr√ºndet. Wir sind √ºberzeugt, dass ein faires und offenes Internet wichtig ist. Soziale Medien sollten nicht nur in der Hand weniger Milliard√§re sein, sondern als Allgemeinwohl gelten und dementsprechend behandelt werden. Mastodon ist schon ein Schritt in die richtige Richtung.

Freie Meinungs√§u√üerung ist ein demokratischer Grundpfeiler, sollte aber niemals als Right-To-Say-Everything missverstanden werden. Wer andere ausgrenzt, Hass verbreitet, menschenverachtende Thesen teilt oder beleidigend ist, schadet der gesamten Gesellschaft.

Gehen wir offen und mit Respekt aufeinander zu ‚Äì davon profitiert im Endeffekt jeder.

Du stimmst den obigen S√§tzen zu? Dann registriere dich und werde ein Teil unserer kleinen Community :)

rules.text: Posts are moderated. Our federation depends on being a trustworthy instance, obeying local jurisdictions, and prohibiting harm and abuse.
Be kind, caring, and collegial. Cultivate positive and meaningful discussions and contributions. Use features and affordances to build and support the community.
No crypto. Our federation depends on inhibiting the infiltration of capitalism into the processes of re-decentralizing the internet.

Accounts will be permanently banned for engaging in the various modes of political violence, bigotry, racism, misogyny, homophobia, transphobia, anti-semitism, ultra-nationalism, targeted harassment, doxxing, and other forms of hate, aggression, and oppression.
Harmful and abusive speech and behaviors include the language and tactics of the white supremacy movement and its affiliations are strictly prohibited and enforced.

instance.title: Campaign
instance.shortDescription: To support this server and the OMN project https://opencollective.com/open-media-network
instance.description:
Founded on #4opens and moderated by an ethical code of conduct. Its a safe space for Campaigning and NGO groups to access their members via #openweb projects. We abide by the Mastodon server Covenant ‚Äî we commit to keeping the service backed up, and to notify you at least three months in advance if the service closes, so you can move your account without losing your network.

"We can't engage as communities, unless we have money. I can't even express how angry this makes me."
- an activist group using Facebook. People and organisations who feel this way are our initial targets.

We are launching two new Mastodon instances for activists and campaigners to aid communication of grassroot groups; putting social media back in our hands by providing a free, unfettered home for campaigners, NGO‚Äôs and activists to communicate among their peers and beyond.

This project is a way out of the restricted, algorithmic, for-profit mediation and commercialisation of communication we increasingly experience. If you do not pay to "boost" each post, a Facebook page will only reach 3-6% of members. This soon becomes an expensive drain on limited NGO and activist budgets.
Activists and campaigners alike are ready to shift their outreach away from the corporate social networks paid-per-view ‚Äúwalled gardens‚Äù.

Mastodon is the worlds largest free open source decentralised microblogging network; it‚Äôs thousands of unique, interconnected communities, filled with different people, interests, languages, and needs.
You‚Äôre free to join any community you like, or better yet, host your own, on your own terms. It remains possible for members of each to instance to interact with others.
There is no monopoly by a single commercial company, no ads, and no tracking.

We aim to help activism/campaigning groups to make this step now.

https://campaign.openworlds.info
https://activism.openworlds.info

A note on Security and Privacy - these take a somewhat different shape within the #openweb. Have a read about our thoughts on the matter.
How are OMN projects run?

Note new accounts are opted out of search engine indexing by default. Some older accounts may not have been subject to this setting, so you should confirm to make sure it's as you want.

contactAccount.note:
Looking at the fluffy side of activism #NGO

#fedi22 #openweb #opensource #4opens #OMN #technology #tech #social #grassroots #activitypub #reboot #fluff

instance.title: Mastodon
instance.shortDescription: Mastodon is an ethically-designed, open-source microblogging platform consisting of a network of independent servers that talk to each other (part of the "fediverse"). It can be thought of as an alternative to Twitter, for example. This particular server focuses on two things: First, fighting oppression, exploitation, abuse and victimization, whether of humans, plants, animals, or the planet itself. Second, helping people heal from any of the above that they have experienced or witnessed.

rules.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people‚Äôs personally identifying information (‚Äúdoxing‚Äù) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email admin@stellar.build
Do not toot in languages other than English (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on ‚Äî just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.
Do not tone police. Even if someone else violates the CoC, it is not your responsibility to moderate them or criticize them for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them.

rules.text: Read the message below these rules carefully. It is important for the future of your account on this server!
This is a gaming-oriented Mastodon instance. It is created by a gamer for gamers. Post anything related to video games. PC gaming, console gaming, VR gaming, mobile gaming...

Politics is not allowed in any form or shape. We are gathered on this instance to provide an escape from reality called video games. We love games, we live games. We welcome you into this community. But if politics is your jam then we welcome you to find yourself a more suitable Mastodon instance.
Before you join this instance, take a moment to think about what these four words mean to you: Peace, Love, Unity, and Respect.

rules.text: No advertising or excessive promotion.
No bots, unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.
No pornography.

Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a CW (Content Warning).
No racism.
No sexism.
No discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin.
No xenophobia, nationalism, casteism, or fascism; no sympathizing with or advocating for these things.
No sexual depictions of children.
No holocaust denialism, no Nazi symbolism, no promotion of National Socialism.
No stalking or harassment. In general, if someone asks you to stop interacting with them, then stop.
Stalking, harassment, hate speech, or doxing that is posted to other instances or on other social media platforms is still grounds for having your account terminated here.
No posting (or threatening to post) other people's personally identifying information ("doxing").
No unwelcome sexual attention.
No public or private oppressive language or actions.
No promotion of conspiracy theories (eg anti-vax, anti-mask, anti-COVID).

instance.title: Mastodon on Tardis World
instance.shortDescription: Mastodon is the social network of the future: No ads, no corporate surveillance, ethical design, and decentralization! Own your data with Mastodon! Tardis World is a "generalist" node in the Mastodon network, open for registration to anyone.
instance.description: All your social communications and personal information don't inevitably have to be in the hands of some big corporation or rich individual. Many functionally-equivalent tools exist in the public domain - "Open-Source software" - for micro-blogging and instant messaging. Tardis World is a home to one of them, Mastodon, the decentralized network of independent micro-blogging nodes. Tardis World is just one node in that network. Tardis World is a "generalist" node open for registration to anyone. Tardis World is currently administered by one guy, Dave, who hosts and runs it. However, if it grows into a community, other people are welcome to step up and shine. Want to get involved? Contact Dave (dave@tardis.world). Tardis World is intended to be basically "family-friendly", but for reasonably mature minds. All interactions are supposed to be in keeping with the Code of Conduct, which aims to prevent harm, hurt or offense to registered users and the wider general public, while imposing as few restrictions as possible. Within those bounds, the ethos is free speech and free expression, personally, socially, politically and artistically. You can also check out the complementing PeerTube video publishing platform, Dalek Zone. Feel free to contact Dave (dave@tardis.world) with whatever questions, requests or inquiries.

contactAccount.note:
What Dave said about Dave: "Some boomer headcase who got his brains frazzled at a young age and never really came back."

When on the run from The Matrix, Dave visits Red Dwarf often, where Kryten is his mentor and Lister keeps the beverages coming.

Dave also spends a lot of time in Dalek Zone (https://dalek.zone).

Dave worships his deity, Linux, and his cat, Yuri.

instance.title: sozzled_sophists
instance.shortDescription: An instance for the discussion of every piece of writing you may have committed to paper in your entire life.
instance.description: "The Sozzled Sophists mailing list is a forum for invited writers to discuss *whatever* projects they may have been working on recently and a chance to receive feedback from other like minded individuals. There are quite a few *-author lists out there for specific *F sites but, having been ground level at the workings of some of these sites, we hope that Sozzled Sophists will provide a unique perspective on all of these things rather than focusing solely upon site. The list is for every piece of writing you may have committed to paper in your entire life. From poetry to fanfiction to pornography."

instance.title: QuarteredCircle.net
instance.description:
QuarteredCircle.net is a social media platform (part of the Fediverse) for the Tech Lord, his cohorts, and the official instance for #DrunkPete and #HorizonLabs. It's server is based in Pittsburgh, PA, USA. We ask that you follow all the laws that we can get in trouble for and generally don't be a dick. If you need something to listen to, we do have our own internet radio, KeepRadio.

Also, first few new sign ups get their own custom emoji*!!

*Until I get sick of giving them out.

contactAccount.note:
I am made of magic, computers, and outer space. I that guy from around the `net, you'll seem me with Bureau 42, #DrunkPete, #HorizonLabs, &c.

Apparently, I am usually talking about comics, magic, or dad stuff.

Oh, and I run this instance, with the help of @Chance.

rules.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

instance.shortDescription: Esta es una instancia feminista, antifascista, antirracista y LGTBIQ-friendly que lucha activamente contra el acoso a sus usuarios y usuarias en todas sus formas, expl√≠citas e impl√≠citas.
instance.description: Esta es una instancia feminista, antifascista, antirracista y LGTBIQ-friendly que lucha activamente contra el acoso a sus usuarios y usuarias en todas sus formas, expl√≠citas e impl√≠citas.

rules.text: Respeta la identidad propia, las experiencias y la personalidad de los dem√°s. Todos los tipos de personalidad son bienvenidos aqu√≠, siempre que respeten y no da√±en a los dem√°s. Al mismo tiempo, ten en cuenta que los dem√°s pueden cometer errores o utilizar una terminolog√≠a diferente a la tuya.

Racismo, machismo, capacitismo, homofobia, transfobia, queerfobia, xenofobia, antisemitismo, islamofobia y supremacismo blanco suponen bloqueo inmediato y, en caso de que los administradores consideren que esta conducta puede ser delictiva, una denuncia inmediata a las autoridades.

Se bloquear√° inmediatamente a toda persona o dominio que impl√≠cita o expl√≠citamente difunda ret√≥rica fascista, nazi, franquista, de extrema derecha y otras formas de nacionalismo violento o excluyente. En caso de detectar un posible delito de odio los administradores contactar√°n con las autoridades.

Se bloquear√° a toda cuenta o dominio que comparta enlaces o material multimedia violento o que promueva la violencia. Los administradores se reservan el derecho a informar a las autoridades en caso de que encuentren indicios de actividad delictiva.

Queda prohibido el acoso a usuarios, usuarias y usuaries en todas sus formas, incluyendo el acoso sexual, sealioning, flaming, doxxing, bullying, joseo, subtooting, outing o suplantaci√≥n de identidad entre otras formas de acoso.

Se bloquear√° a toda cuenta o dominio que promueva conductas lesivas para la salud como el consumo y distribuci√≥n de drogas, los trastornos de alimentaci√≥n, las autolesiones, el suicidio, la ludopat√≠a y la apolog√≠a de conductas da√±inas para la salud f√≠sica y mental de la persona en general.

Se puede compartir ocasionalmente el propio trabajo o el de otras personas, pero no est√° permitido el marketing agresivo, el spam o publicitar productos y servicios si se recibe un pago o recompensa sustancial por ello.
Se considera recompensa sustancial cualquier regalo al usuario por un valor superior a 20‚Ç¨. El beneficio propio por compartir cualquier enlace promocional ha de ser debidamente advertido.

Queda terminantemente prohibida la distribuci√≥n de textos, enlaces o material multimedia donde se incluya o sugiera actividad sexual o desnudos de menores, reales o figurados. Los administradores de Paquita podr√°n contactar con las autoridades en caso de que detecten posible actividad delictiva.

Paquita es una instancia libre de pornograf√≠a. No se permite a usuarios, usuarias o usuaries, trabajadores sexuales o no, que distribuyan repetidamente enlaces o material multimedia donde se muestre actividad sexual o fluidos corporales, aunque se haga catalogando el material como sensible y #NSFW.

Compartir material multimedia o enlaces sobre desnudez est√° permitido, siempre que sean desnudos propios de la persona que sube el material, sin involucrar a terceros, y que se catalogue como material sensible y se incluya advertencia o CW sobre este contenido, con las etiquetas #NSFW y #Nudity.
Se bloquear√° a usuarios y dominios que compartan repetidamente bulos (especialmente bulos pol√≠ticos, cient√≠ficos o sanitarios) o teor√≠as conspirativas tales como la Teor√≠a del Reemplazo.

Queda terminantemente prohibido promocionar o distribuir contenidos relacionados con las criptomonedas, esquemas Ponzi o de econom√≠a piramidal, juegos de azar, apuestas de cualquier tipo, loot boxes o consejos de trading tanto en mercados regulados como no regulados.
Se proh√≠be la difusi√≥n de material multimedia o enlaces que muestren a personas en estado de embriaguez o bajo el efecto del abuso de drogas, tanto legales como ilegales.

Podr√° mostrarse material audiovisual de alcohol y tabaco siempre con content warning y en un contexto de moderaci√≥n. Se proh√≠ben los enlaces para comprar o promocionar alcohol o tabaco en cualquier circunstancia.

Queda prohibida la difusi√≥n o promoci√≥n de textos, enlaces o material audiovisual acerca de las llamadas ‚Äúbebidas energ√©ticas‚Äù con alto contenido en cafe√≠na, cuyo marketing est√° dirigido espec√≠ficamente a menores, especialmente vulnerables.
Est√° terminantemente prohibida la difusi√≥n de material audiovisual o enlaces que muestren drogas ilegales o de venta muy restringida, como la marihuana.

Se proh√≠be aconsejar la toma de cualquier medicamento, requiera este o no prescripci√≥n m√©dica. Si una persona solicita consejo m√©dico y alguien habilitado para ello quiere d√°rselo, deber√° ser estrictamente en privado.

En Paquita se interpretar√° la insistencia en dar consejos sobre dieta, estilo de vida y salud a una persona que no los ha solicitado como una forma de acoso. Intentar avergonzar a una persona por su cuerpo o aspecto f√≠sico supone expulsi√≥n inmediata.

La legislaci√≥n aplicable en la instancia Paquita es la del estado de Espa√±a. Asimismo, no se permitir√° ning√∫n contenido ilegal en Alemania. Paquita se adhiere activamente a los principios de la Declaraci√≥n Universal de los Derechos Humanos y la Convenci√≥n de Derechos del Ni√±o.

En semejanza al concepto jur√≠dico de "buena fe", Paquita espera que sus usuarios se atendr√°n en todo momento al esp√≠ritu de la normativa aqu√≠ esbozada y no intentar√°n aprovechar detalles formales de la redacci√≥n de las normas en su beneficio.

rules.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behavior and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalized groups.
We do not tolerate threatening behavior, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigadier, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.
We (@adrian, @dorian and @tom) are maintaining this instance on our spare time, hardware and nerves. Don't push either of those.

instance.shortDescription: This is the monogram.org Mastadon server. monogram.org started in 1999 as a community of likeminded people interested in open discourse about technology, arts, culture, and a better world. The domain monogram.org is inspired by Robert Rauschenberg's Combine Monogram. We got inspired, around 1994, by Monogram through the documentary series "The Shock of the New" where Robert Hughes discusses pop art and its influences on modern culture. The community around monogram.org has continued a sort of Flex Seminar through online forums and other activities over the years.

instance.shortDescription: designed and built by and for podcasts lovers
instance.description: Podcasting is entering a new era. The past two decades of organic growth were driven by original audio content producers. Major digital players and audio content industry are now investing on Podcasts. Yet, compared to the standards in Social Media and Search Engines, Podcasts - technology, user experience - have not evolved for the past 20 years. It is time for all players - Podcasters, Radio Networks, Journalists, Writers and all Voice lovers - to take control of their medium. Our mission is to help find a path to repairing podcast broadcasting and make it free again.

Skrivel.se is a bit of a play on words lost in translation. Hosted by two nerds from sweden but most posts are in english on here. We're a small instance with an active federated timeline. We'd love to have you on, but you should expect us to say hi, and to ask who you are üòâ

The server is very active, but small.
instance.description:
English up top, Swedish down below
The Swedish word "skrivelse" can mean a whole bunch of things ranging from letter, to communication, why not try a missive. On skrivel.se it's a 500 character toot! This is a mastodon instance run by two nerds. Mostly because we wanted an instance, because why not, but also because the more the merrier on mastodon.

On a smaller instance (we're as small as they come) it's a good idea to know your mods and admins. So if you sign up here you're likely to get a message from us. And if you have any questions, please send us one.

@openess @habmala

instance.description:
Welcome to the future gadget lab's Mastodon instance! Feel free to join us. Our instance is targeted towards fans of Steins;Gate and other Science Adventure Series titles.

Fans of other anime, as well as tech-enthusiasts, are also welcome. By registering here, you agree to accept and follow the rules of this instance.

Since this is a small instance, please ask your peers/friends if they are already using Mastodon (or other Fediverse Platforms which are compatible, like Pleroma or gnu-social). If they are, ask for their @username@servername info, and add them to your "following" list here. This way we can get more interaction and fun on our timelines! :)

Please do not use hotmail/windows live/outlook.com e-mail addresses when registering if possible. This organization tends to have problems with our e-mail server.

rules.text: Follow the human rights http://www.ohchr.org/EN/UDHR/Documents/UDHR_Translations/eng.pdf
- Boosting will be treated the same as posting that content. Only boost stuff that is not against the rules.
- When interacting with other instances, you must follow our rules as well as the other instances rules.
- We won't support hateful speech or harassment on this instance, therefore it is forbidden.
- We support free speech for everybody. Just don't be disrespectful, regardless of your political views.
- Discrimination is not allowed. It does not matter whether you discriminate a majority or a minority or a single person.
Don't upload anything illegal / you haven't got rights on it, if anything illegal came from here, contact a member of staff or use the report button.

- Before clicking the report button, keep in mind that we can't fully take action when it comes to posts from outside of the instance, however your report will be sent anonymously to the original instance.
You must not upload anything illegal or material that you don't have the licence/copyright for.
With illegal, we mean: Content that is against any laws of Germany or the European Union.
You must not upload any form of pornography.
Always credit the artists of the art you post.
Other NSFW (that is not pornographic) material must be posted hidden using the spoiler button.

rules.text: Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behaviour may lead to moderation and/or further measures.
We have a zero tolerance approach to discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia.
Moderation decisions are final.
The Content Warning flag should be used for NSFW content, and NSFW media should be marked as sensitive.

Account registrations are monitored and accounts considered spam (including commercial advertising, political campaigning/propaganda, duplicate accounts or impersonating legal entities) will be moderated or removed.

We fully subscribe to and comply with the Mastodon Server Covenant. A number of instance blocks are implemented to comply with the principles of the covenant and to prevent our users from being exposed to content that does not comply with our instance rules.

instance.title: Bonn.social
instance.shortDescription:
Bonn.social ist eine Mastodon-Instanz f√ºr Bonn, Rhein-Sieg und f√ºr alle, die Bonn und die Region m√∂gen. Hier findest Du unsere Hausregeln. ‚ù§Ô∏è

F√ºr die Registrierung erwarten wir einen kleinen Satz, was du an Bonn und der Region magst, dann schalten wir dich so schnell es geht frei (und sind sicher, dass du kein Spam-Bot bist). Die Freischaltung kann jedoch bis zu einem Werktag dauern. ‚è∞

Wenn Du m√∂chtest, kannst du Bonn.social finanziell unterst√ºtzen!. Das motiviert uns und hilft die Kosten f√ºr den Betrieb zu decken. Etwas zwischen 1-5‚Ç¨ monatlich bzw. 12-60‚Ç¨ j√§hrlich sind ein guter Richtwert f√ºr eine freiwillige Spende. üí∏

Last but not least, die Pflichtangaben, die keiner liest: üôà Impressum & Datenschutzerkl√§rung
instance.description:
Bonn.social ist ein soziales Netzwerk f√ºr mit Fokus auf Bonn, Rhein-Sieg und Region und ist ein Teil des Fediverse.

  • Es funktioniert so √§hnlich wie Twitter, aber man hat 500 Zeichen zur Verf√ºgung und mehr Einstellungen f√ºr die Privatsph√§re.
  • Es funktioniert so √§hnlich wie E-Mail, weil jeder seinen eigenen Server betreiben kann, trotzdem kann jeder mit jedem im Netzwerk schreiben.
  • Die Software f√ºr dieses Netzwerk hei√üt Mastodon. Es ist eine freie Software, jeder kann sie nutzen und den gesamten Quellcode lesen.
  • Auch deine Daten sind hier frei. Du kannst jederzeit deine Follows und Daten exportieren und zu einem anderen Server umziehen oder einen eigenen Server betreiben (lassen).

Bonn.social ist eine Mastodon-Instanz von Bonn.digital f√ºr Bonn-Rhein-Sieg und einfach alle, die die Region m√∂gen. Thema darf nat√ºrlich gerne Bonn sein, muss es aber nicht. Die Regeln werden von den Bonn.social-Administratoren und -Moderatoren so entwickelt, dass sich alle hier wohlf√ºhlen k√∂nnen.

Wenn Du uns freiwillig unterst√ºtzen m√∂chtest, findest Du hier weitere Informationen: Bonn.social unterst√ºtzen!. Etwas zwischen 1-5‚Ç¨ monatlich bzw. 12-60‚Ç¨ j√§hrlich sind ein guter Richtwert. Mehr ist auch ok.

Pflichtangaben: Impressum, Datenschutzerkl√§rung

rules.text: CW (Content Warning) Tag: must be used for any gore, smut, nudity, NSFW/NSFL stuff - anything people may want to prepare themselves for or to not see over work's wifi.

CW (Content Warning) Tag: Encouraged but not mandatory use for: politics, DWP/Government horror, spoilers and discussion of plot for media and books, or extensive roleplaying discussion that may not be interesting to everyone.  But please use them for anything you want, they're helpful :)

Unwanted Content: Repetitive commercial spam - updates on ongoing projects are fine, but identical repetition of adverts is not.  This instance is for talking to people about your/their cool stuff not commercial business advertisements.
Unwanted Content: Bots - Please ask first, if you want to run a bot please make sure it posts unlisted or followers only and be careful with it.

Shitty Banned Content: racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, being shitty to gender & sexual minorities (including kinkshaming), ableism, sexualised depictions of children or lolicon (not the fashion), violent nationalism, facism, national socialism, holocaust denial, casteism, or xenophobia.

Shitty Banned Behaviour: Don't stalk, harass (wide interpretation), dox, or post any private information about people (names or other aliases/accounts, addresses, locations, pictures, etc) without permission.

Shitty Banned Behaviour: Respect requests to drop subjects/stop interacting with people, including unsolicited advice, don't try and get others to gang up on anyone.  Don't be an arse and hassle people about their bodies, minds, or lives.  TL;DR don't be an edgelord or ill socialised prat.

Peoples time and energy are not infinite: No obligation to follow or interact with others, if someones posting or topics are exhausting then please disengage from them/filter out keywords.  If someone unfollows/blocks/filters you, try not to feel bad about it, assume they are busy/exhausted.

Esta es una instancia cerrada, para poder unirte deber√°s tener una invitaci√≥n.
Esta instancia no esta siendo ejecutada en lo que se podr√≠a denominar un "servidor de producci√≥n". Esta instancia esta siendo ejecutada en una placa base rescatada de la basura.
Debido a esto no se garantiza la continuidad del servicio, por lo que simplemente la utilizo como mi instancia personal.
En un futuro moveremos el servicio a un servidor como se debe y abriremos el registro al publico, pero por el momento y como no podemos garantizar la continuidad del servicio, los registros de nuevos usuarios est√°n limitados.

This is a closed instance, in order to join you must have an invitation.
This instance is not running on what might be called a "production server". This instance is running on a motherboard rescued from the trash. Because of this no continuity of service is guaranteed, so I am simply using it as my personal instance.
In the future we will move the service to a proper server and open the registration to the public, but for the moment and as we cannot guarantee the continuity of the service, new user registrations are limited.
Visita/Visit Join Mastodon y elige tu comunidad / and choose a community.

instance.title: know.me.uk Mastodon
instance.shortDescription: UK Based Mastodon Server - available to all *humans* and *purposeful* automations. Requests for accounts are checked before approval to keep things safe and sane.
instance.description:
UK Based Mastodon Server - available to all *humans* and *purposeful* automations. Requests for accounts are checked before approval to keep things safe and sane. 

Run by some folks who run an IT Support and Services company in Exeter, Devon, UK. 

If we know you already (personally or professionally) that's great, but that isn't a requirement for an account here at all. 

Your race, sexual orientation, chosen career, work status, financial standing etc and all the other discriminatory things are not relevant here - you're welcome regardless.

The only real requirements are:

- Don't do illegal stuff, the law didn't magically go away here

- Don't use the platform to attack other people, systems or services

We're not interested in your data, we're not interested in tracking you - there is no dodgy dealing going on behind the scenes and we absolutely promise your data is NEVER open for sale to anyone else.

Use common sense. Otherwise, enjoy!

instance.shortDescription:
Une fois pour TOOT !

This instance is provided by Petites Singularit√©s ASBL for like-minded people in Brussels and elsewhere.

We speak English, French, Dutch.

P.S.: works with free software and grassroots activists across disciplines, ranging from agro-ecology to cartography, libre aesthetics & ethics, (self-)organization & policy.

Discuss this on ps.zoethical.org.

Support this instance

Send donations to IBAN BE16 3630 1548 4674 (Petites Singularit√©s ASBL) with mention ‚Äúps.s10y.eu‚Äù (and your name if and only if you want to be credited): we publish donations as we receive them, and expenses. Yearly service is expected to cost ~ 150 ‚Ç¨ (without sysadmin expenses.)

‚ÄúWe've got to fight the government, fight the oligarchy, fight capitalism, be internationalist and fight the empire because it's the best hope to enrich hundreds of millions of lives, and build towards a truly equitable future.‚Äù
‚Äî Abby Martin

Norms

  • Use English, French, or Flemish on this instance. Other languages will be excluded.
  • Be excellent to each other! We reserve the right to ban anyone who doesn't comply.
  • Fight the power!

Break in Case of Emergency

If you have any problem with someone on this instance, thank you to flag messages appropriately and contact the staff.

As this is a federated network, we expressly forbid contents such as: spam, pornography without NSFW tag, hate speech, racism, sexism, consumerism, corporatism, and nationalism.

Your Friendly Staff

@how, @natacha.

rules.text: Stay legal. Respect international laws, from the country the instance is hold in (France), laws from the admins' country (France), and from your own country.
Be respectful. Don‚Äôt go insult others, whether you say it straight to their face or not.
Be respectful. Content that is spammy, racist, sexist, hateful, or discriminating in any way is forbidden.
Be respectful. "Screenshot dunking", or taking screenshots of posts to repost, is strongly discouraged, and may lead to admin action.
Content Warning policy. CW drugs and lewd posts and pictures, kinks must be listed in the CW.
Content Warning policy. Politics, religion, and other polemical subjects must be CW accordingly.
Content Warning policy. Requests for financial help, and similar, are welcome when under CW. However try not to spam them.
Content Warning policy. Bot posting must be CW as such,and follow the specifications in the "Accounts policy" section.
Accounts policy. Do not impersonate someone, unless for parody purposes (Ramaining respectful). This includes using other peoples' artworks without permission.
Accounts policy. Parody accounts must be tagged as such clearly in their profile description.
Accounts policy. Bots must be tagged as such, and bot owners must ensure they will have a minimal impact on the instance's performances.
Accounts policy. Bots should only post in "unlisted", "followers only", or "direct" privacy settings, not public, to keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users.
Accounts policy. You may not create another account on this instance if your previous account has been suspended.
Accounts policy. You may not use an avatar if it shows content that is listed to be content warned.
Accounts policy. You may not use a header image if it shows content that is listed to be content warned.
Be respectful. Stalking and harassment is forbidden, if someone doesn‚Äôt want to have anything to do with you, leave them alone.

Content Warning policy. We heavily encourage the use of the content warning system for quality of life on contents such as food, selfies, current popular topics (e.g. game release), conventions/live events, liveposting, threads and long posts.
Don't repost artworks without crediting the artist. If you have a link to their gallery, perfect, if only their name, better than nothing. Claiming other's art as your own may lead to suspension.

Content Warning policy. Crossposts from twitter must be under a CW, frequent crossposting must be unlisted. Failure to do so will be considered as spam and result in a freeze or suspension of your account after a couple warnings.
Content Warning policy. NSFW, Gore, ¬´Real Life¬ª and lewd content must be set as unlisted or followers only in addition to proper tagging in the CW.

instance.title: Fosstodon
instance.shortDescription: Fosstodon is an English speaking Mastodon instance that is open to anyone who is interested in technology; particularly free & open source software.
instance.description:
Fosstodon is an English speaking Mastodon instance that is dedicated to Free & Open Source Software, or FOSS as many call it.

Fosstodon is for people who are interested in open source technology and the awesome community around it. Whether that be Linux, open source software like Firefox, or Mastodon itself. If you're interested in technology, Fosstodon is a great place to start.

We're not just techies on Fosstodon though! We like to think of tech as the hobby that brings us all together, but it doesn't define us. That's why we encourage all our members to post about whatever interests them, not just tech (so long as it is allowed under our CoC).

contactAccount.note: The official Fosstodon account for the instance. Instance admins are @kev and @mike.

fields.name: Support us
fields.value: https://hub.fosstodon.org/support-us

fields.name: CoC
fields.value: https://hub.fosstodon.org/code-of-conduct

rules.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people‚Äôs personally identifying information (‚Äúdoxing‚Äù) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the Fosstodon community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email team@fosstodon.org.

Do not toot in languages other than English (which makes moderation prohibitively difficult).

https://hub.fosstodon.org/why-fosstodon-is-english-only/

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on ‚Äî just keep the toot itself interesting).
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not ‚Äúshitpost‚Äù - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for ‚Äúshitposting‚Äù on Fosstodon.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on Fosstodon, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.

instance.description: This will be my personal page where I will sound off on whatever is caught inside my head at the moment. Since I happen to be an Independent Leftist/Socialist who also happens to be unabashedly pro-pornography, pro-consensual adult sexual expression, and pro-sexworker/decriminalization and destigmatization of sex work, plenty of those thoughts will be NSFW and highly explicit. Therefore, membership here will be restricted to those approved by me who are at least 18 years of age, who aren't afraid of explicit sex talk. I will also use this instance to promote some of my favorite women of adult entertainment and special sex-positive people. This is NOT, however, a page for those wishing to use it for spamming their sites, or to post content stolen or taken from official talent without their approval. Any such spamming will be deleted and the perpetrator(s) instantly banned. Also, please refrain from tooting any pics or videos of your...members...without my or any of the other members' expressed approval. I am getting adjusted to using Mastodon as an alternative to Twitter, but it's a gradual process; so cut me some slack if I make some mistakes. Any professional advice on using this medium will be welcome. For those of you wanting to see a sample of my madness, go over to my Twitter timeline at: http://www.twitter.com/RGC_BPPA I am also a member of these Mastodon instances: @AJKSexLefty@switter.at (Switter, the sex worker instance) @AJK_RGCIndyLeft@mastodon.social (the main Mastodon social instance)

rules.text: 1) This instance does contain sexually explicit content and language. No one under 18 or who cannot view explicit adult content under the law will be allowed. Violators will be removed post haste.

2) Debate is welcome here, but be civil and respectful. However, snark or smack towards those who are obviously disrespectful or just being plain scmucky will be allowed at my discretion. To avoid that, simply don't be a schmuck or a bootyhole.

Consensual sexual adult speech and media is more than welcome here. However, it's strongly suggested for the sake of respect towards the squeamish and sensitive that you label any nudity or explicit sexual content as "sensitive".

Do not upload any content that does not involve legal consensual *adult* sexual acts, images, or language. Also, sexual content involving animals or children, scat, golden showers, or lack of consent IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED, and subject to instant removal and banishment of its provider.

Spamming of links to adult sites is strictly prohibited and subject to instant banishment. Linkage to official adult sites of performers is allowed, as long as it goes to the splash pages of the content providers, or to legitimate fan support sites. "Catfishing" to fake sites is strictly prohibited.

This instance is explicitly and very much Left of center. I toot from a sex-positive feminist/Independent Left/Socialist POV; and my opinions are mine alone. Take it as you wish. Your opinions of me do not matter, unless I make it so.

I reserve to myself as administrator and moderator of this instance the right to run it as I see fit, and my decisions are final, and not subject to debate. This is not a free carrier for abuse, hate, bigotry, poop posting, or otherwise hostile speech. Don't temp fate!

instance.title: Mastodon Social Italia
instance.shortDescription:
Benvenuto su Mastodon Uno! Qui potete leggere Chi Siamo

Mastodon fa parte di un Social Network federato composto da molti siti web: il Fediverso, qua una breve guida al fediverso italiano. Ci√≤ significa che nessun singolo sito controlla l'intera rete, piuttosto, come la posta elettronica, i volontari e le organizzazioni gestiscono i propri siti indipendenti nei quali gli utenti possono interagire tra loro anche se registrati in siti differenti. I siti mastodon vengono chiamati "Istanze" e Mastodon.uno √® la prima istanza generalista indirizzata ai soli utenti italofoni all'interno del fediverso e rispetta i principi cardine dei social decentralizzati: indipendenti, etici, liberi, gratuiti, senza pubblicit√†, senza algoritmi che scelgano cosa devi vedere, senza raccolta dati e autogestiti dalla propria community. Qui il nostro blog ufficiale

Questa istanza italiana √® stata creata per dare uno spazio libero di condivisione e discussione a tutti gli utenti di lingua italiana, sebbene i messaggi possano anche essere scritti in altre lingue, questa istanza mastodon √® riservata esclusivamente ai soli utenti italofoni. Con oltre 23000 iscritti √® il pi√π grande sito mastodon italiano nel fediverso. Se non volete un social network in cui Mark Zuckerberg, Elon Musk o un altro CEO miliardario determini cosa potete pubblicare e quali post possano essere visti, Mastodon √® una buona alternativa. Mastodon √® costruito come una versione pi√π etica di Twitter e al momento √® il pi√π grande social network decentralizzato.

Mastodon.uno √® gestito dal gruppo Gruppo Devol, potete rimanere aggiornati su mastodon e le altre attivit√† seguendo il blog, iscrivendovi alla Newsletter ed attraverso il canale telegram dove verranno pubblicati i comunicati ufficiali.

Mastodon.uno si autofinanzia esclusivamente con le donazioni degli utenti utilizzando la piattaforma open Liberapay:


Benvenuti in una federazione di social dove gli inserzionisti pubblicitari non sono i padroni di casa.

Dove i vostri dati non sono raccolti e venduti.

Dove siete voi, non gli algoritmi, a decidere cosa vedere.

Dove le azioni tossiche e ingannevoli vengono tenute fuori.

Dove passare il tempo in modo piacevole.

Benvenuti su un social gentile e rispettoso.

Benvenuti su mastodon.uno.

Per sostenere mastodon si pu√≤ anche offrire un caff√® al gruppo devol che si occupa della gestione di questa istanza e di molte altre per garantire un futuro pi√π libero e decentralizzato. E' possibile donare un caff√® anonimamente senza l'obbligo di creare un account:


Oppure si possono fare donazioni con le criptomonete Bitcoin, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Stellar Lumens, Monero:


Puoi supportare mastodon anche utilizzando il browser Brave, attivandone gli annunci e donando la criptomoneta BAT che puoi accumulare nell'utilizzo di tutti i giorni.


Un motore di ricerca decentralizzato e rispettoso della privacy come presearch pu√≤ aiutare anche mastodon. Ad ogni ricerca accumulerai la criptomoneta PRE, al raggiungimento di 50 PRE, 25 verranno donati a mastodon se ti iscriverai cliccando qui sotto:


Chi siamo e cos'√® Mastodon
instance.description:
Mastodon.uno √® il social network generalista Italiano parte della pi√π grande rete internazionale di social interconnessi liberi ed open source: Il Fediverso, un neologismo composto dall'unione di due parole "federazione" e "universo". √à un nome comune per i social network federati che funzionano con software libero aperto su pi√π di 6000 server in tutto il mondo e che al momento supera i 4 milioni di iscritti. Storicamente, questo termine ha incluso solo le piattaforme di microblogging che supportavano un insieme di protocolli chiamati OStatus. Con la comparsa e l'ampia adozione di un nuovo protocollo standard chiamato ActivityPub si √® creata un grande numero di nuovi progetti liberi che intendono dare un'alternativa ai social commerciali. I social network del Fediverso sono molto differenti rispetto alle piattaforme mainstream (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, ecc). In primo luogo, tutte le reti federate sono sviluppate da comunit√† di persone in tutto il mondo, indipendentemente da qualsiasi societ√† o istituzione ufficiale. Questo significa che puoi partecipare allo sviluppo e alla crescita del Fediverse. Tutte le competenze sono preziose: diffondere la parola, invitare amici sono attivit√† molto gradite. Un'altra differenza di questi social network dai silos aziendali √® il principio della federazione. Le reti principali concentrano milioni di utenti sui loro server. Questo d√† loro il pericoloso potere di controllare le informazioni e di accumulare i dati privati degli utenti, utilizzandoli a scopo di lucro commerciale (e chiss√† quali altr scopii). Le reti Fediverse sono progettate per essere gestite da chiunque: sei libero di scegliere e registrarti su qualsiasi server che ti piace, puoi scegliere la persona che si occuper√† dei tuoi dati - l'amministratore del tuo server. Se hai una ottima conoscenza tecnica, puoi amministrare il tuo server per i tuoi amici e la tua famiglia, collegandoti a tuo piacimento con migliaia di altri server indipendenti attraverso il web. In un certo senso, Fediverse √® un universo autonomo dove il potere e i dati sono decentralizzati e sparsi in pi√π paesi, mentre i siti web aziendali tradizionali si sono fatti ciascuno un imperatore (o un tiranno?) del proprio enorme impero, circondati da alte recinzioni, e riservano a se stessi tutte le decisioni, il controllo dei dati e la censura. Mastodon.uno √® interconnesso con tutte le reti federate ed √® interoperabile con ognuna di loro fancente capo al "Fediverso" ed √® la community italiana ad essere consigliata dal sito ufficiale di mastodon in quanto segue rigidi criteri di affidabilit√† fra cui: ci sono pi√π di un responsabile tecnico disponibile 24h in caso di problemi, garazie nel mantenere il sito attivo online, moderazione attiva contro azioni discrimitorie e di odio. Mastodon.uno √® inoltre una delle poche istanze in cui √® attiva la ricerca sul testo, che √® disattivata nella maggior parte delle istanze in quanto richiede un'enorme potenza di calcolo.

Mastodon non ti obbliga a iscriverti con il tuo nome e cognome o con il tuo numero di telefono, puoi mantenere la tua privacy ed utilizzare qualsiasi nome, abbiamo solo bisogno di una email per la verifica. Oppure al contrario se desideri avere un account con una identit√† vericata/verificabile basta inserire un piccolo script che trovi nel tuo pannello di modifica del profilo all'interno della home del tuo sito. Oppure utilizzando l'app open source keybase per verificare la propria identit√† su pi√π social: keybase su mastodon.uno, keybase √® una piattaforma con cui si pu√≤ confermare che diversi profili social facciano capo a s√© (per intenderci confermi gli account che gestisci), in modo sicuro utilizzando la crittografia. I social commerciali come facebook e twitter negli ultimi anni si sono distinti per la capacit√† di disseminare disinformazione, teorie cospirazioniste e con lo scandalo Cambridge Analytica, la manipolazione dell'opinione pubblica. Inoltre le fake news, gli haters, la profilatura e la vendita dei dati personali a scopi commerciali. Questi ed altri sono i fenomeni problematici emersi solo negli ultimi anni attorno e dentro ai social network commerciali, Facebook in primis.
Facebook, Twitter eGoogle esistono vendendo i tuoi dati a terzi inserzionisti per sovvenzionare i servizi che ricevi gratuitamente, ma questo √® molto negativo per la privacy degli utenti, perch√© le aziende sono incentivate ad abusare il pi√π possibile della tua privacy. L'alternativa √® il modello di Mastodon... abbiamo una certa percentuale di utenti che donano ed √® questo che ci sostiene.
I social come facebook e twitter devono rispondere ai loro azionisti e aumentarne i profitti, usano gli algoritmi per creare la bolla di filtraggio: una gabbia rassicurante all‚Äôinterno della quale, grazie all‚Äôintervento dei dati profilati di ogni utente, vediamo quasi esclusivamente contenuti che confermano quelle che gi√† sono le nostre credenze.

Lungi dal mantenere la promessa originaria del web, ovvero offrire agli utenti un‚Äôinformazione libera e diversificata, Facebook e compagnia non farebbero che mostrarci quello che vogliamo vedere, tenendoci spesso al riparo da informazioni che potrebbero incrinare le nostre certezze e rendere la nostra esperienza sui social media meno confortevole, questo rendere sempre pi√π piacevole il trascorrere il tempo nei social ha come effetto un aumentando della permanenza e la dipendenza da social.

Se √® vero che i social hanno accorciato le distante e favorito lo scambio e la comunicazione a distanza, √® altrettanto vero che il prezzo da pagare in termini di rinuncia alla privacy e controllo sociale √® davvero troppo alto.

Simile a Twitter nelle funzionalit√†, le caratteristiche di Mastodon Italia sono profondamente e concettualmente molto diverse, al punto di farne una sorta di anti-Facebook. Anzitutto la tutela dell'anonimato, questione maggiormente critica se consideriamo la creatura di Mark Zuckerberg. Mastodon, invece, √® pensato e sviluppato per non pubblicare n√© conservare alcun dato sensibile, a tutela della privacy degli utenti. In questo senso, dunque, non profila e non detiene alcun dato personali a scopi commerciali o politici, non utilizza pubblicit√† o script che potrebbero profilare gli utenti e venderli per scopi commerciali ma si mantiene con le donazioni su Patreon.
Il software Mastodon non monitora tutto quel genere di informazioni che invece vengono registrare da piattaforme sociali correlate come Twitter, Instagram o Facebook: non calcola chi secondo lui potrebbe diventar mio amico/a. Non registra i millisecondi su cui mi soffermo su un‚Äôimmagine, gli errori di battitura, i like, il tasso di engagement o il tipo di relazione che intercorre tra me ed un altro utente, quale sia il mio lavoro, i luoghi che visito. Non geolocalizza la mia posizione. Come vedremo, Mastodon manco mi chiede come mi chiamo e non mi obbliga nemmanco a comunicargli tutti i numeri nella mia Rubrica. Inoltre, come vedremo, puoi far s√¨ che non sia in grado di leggere quel che tu scrivi. Il software Mastodon, insomma, raccoglie giusto le informazioni tecniche necessarie a funzionare.
Mastodon non √© legato a doppio filo al tuo telefono o ad una singola app, per cui puoi accederci attraverso una delle app per android e iphone gratuite e open source, ma anche se il telefono l‚Äôavessi perso o distrutto potrai utilizzarlo. In effetti si pu√≤ benissimo usare Mastodon su PC Linux, Windows, Mac e su qualsiasi altro dispositivo via Browser senza mai dover dare il tuo numero di telefono.
Il software utilizzato dai server Mastodon √© F.L.O.S.S. ossia aperto, libero e verificabile da chiunque. Qualsiasi persona capace di programmare pu√≤ verificare ci√≤ che il software Mastodon fa, esattamente come un meccanico che pu√≤ aprire un cofano, vedere il motore, trovarne i difetti, metterci le mani e migliorarlo
Mastodon, inoltre, viene gestito in modo collettivo, senza un vero e proprio padrone, ogni contenuto inserito rimane di propriet√† dell'utente, pu√≤ essere esportato e salvato per intero e utilizzato per altre piattaforme compatibili, in questo modo non si perderanno mai i contatti e i contenuti creati.
Mastodon.uno √® autogestito ed autofinanziato, non √® una societ√† che cerca di creare profitto dalla tua vita e dai tuoi contenuti. Il tuo supporto via Patreon o Liberapay √® fondamentale per mantenere questo servizio attivo ed efficiente.

instance.title: Mastodon Transit Authority
instance.shortDescription: People-, city-, and transit-oriented fediverse community.
instance.description:
ridetrans.it is a transit-themed (with perhaps a visual theme to match someday!) server operated in Seattle by a group of local bus enthusiasts. We believe that cities are for people, housing is a need, and transit is the best.

Our admin group includes folks with multiply marginalized identities and we hope you let us know what you need to feel more welcome here.

You should ideally know someone who is already on the server or someone who knows someone who is. But if you also just like trains and buses, put that in your sign-up message and you'll likely be let through!

contactAccount.note: This is the general admin and announcements account for social.ridetrans.it; you probably want a real human!

This Mastodon instance was setup in response to the big wave of new users from Spain at the beginning of 2020. Everyone can sign up and have fun in the great world of federated social networking. No ads, no tracking and many nice people. We support 5000 chars per post.

instance.title: QuasselKopf - Person die viel redet.
instance.shortDescription:
Mastodon ist ein soziales Netzwerk. Es basiert auf offenen Web-Protokollen und freier, quelloffener Software. Es ist dezentral, so wie die E-Mail. 
QuasselKopf.de dient zum Micro-Bloggen und bis auf weiteres nur für dessen Betreiber. Eventuell auch in Zukunft für ausgewählte Kontakte. Einladungen werden nicht auf Anfrage erteilt!
instance.description:
Quasselkopf.de wurde vom Betreiber zum Micro-Bloggen erschaffen, sowie um sich auf einfache Art und Weise mit dem FediVerse zu verbinden.
Alles was sich nicht in einem "Toot" ergo Beitrag(engl. = Post) mit 500-Zeichen beschreiben lässt, das sollte eh im vollwertigen Blog publiziert werden.
Eine Einladung zur Registrierung wird weder auf Anfrage erteilt noch durch betteln danach, denn beide Verhaltensweisen haben nur als Ergebnis das jene Person sowie dessen E-Mail Adresse auf der Blacklist(Schwarzen-Liste) des Servers eingetragen werden. Sollte daraus eine penetrante Verhaltensweise entstehen, wird die Sachlage zu erst als Anzeige der Polizeit übergeben sowie des weiteren an einen entsprechenden Anwalt.
